sentence.Network_en: It is counter-productive to address an interviewee in patronizing tones.
sentence.Network_cn: 以盛气凌人的语气同面试者讲话将会适得其反。

sentence.Network_en: The success depends on good rapport between interviewer and interviewee.
sentence.Network_cn: 成功取决于采访者与被采访者之间的良好沟通。

sentence.Network_en: Guide the interviewee towards examining problems and away from expressing solutions.
sentence.Network_cn: 引导访谈对象进行问题研究,但要避免寻求解决方案.

list.abs: the seasoned interviewers will understand it when hearing . the enterprises like honest interviewees .有经验的招聘者一听就会明白，外企喜欢诚实的求职者。

more than 90 percent of the interviewees said they would take up a job after graduating and then consider starting their own business two or three years down the road .超过90%的受访者称，他们打算毕业后先找份工作，干个两三年后再自己创业。
During the interview , some interviewees tend to exaggerate ., 面试时 , 有些面试者会有夸大的倾向.
the survey found that about 10 per cent the interviewees want to travel to Hong Kong and Macau during the holiday , increase of 3 per cent over year .调查发现，有大约10％的受访者希望假日期间到香港和澳门旅游，较去年增加了3％。

entry.def: An interviewee is a person who is being interviewed.
